templates.value:
[[if(NumberOfIssuers == 0)

{[[NoIssuers]]}

elseif(NumberOfIssuers == 1)

{[[OneIssuer]]}

elseif(NumberOfSectors == 1)

{[[ManyIssuersOneSector]]}

else

{[[ManyIssuersManySectors]]}

]]

Please note that all values are theoretical, actual market valuation may differ slightly.
Your [[PortfolioName]] does not have any investments. Please select a portfolio with investments to see a report about it.
You will fill in this template during the second part of the workshop.

The value of your [[PortfolioName]] is [[Dollar(WholeJSON.groupValue)]]. You have investments across [[Alpha(NumberOfIssuers)]] different issuers spanning [[Alpha(NumberOfSectors)]] sectors. [[SortedSectors[0].key]] is your largest sector allocation in the portfolio, making up [[Percent(SortedSectors[0].groupWeight)]] of the total value. Your [[Alpha(len(TopIssuers))]] largest allocations by issuer are [[map(TopIssuers, i -> IssuerTotal(i))]] and the [[Alpha(sum(map(TopIssuers, i -> len(i.values))))]] positions across these [[Alpha(len(TopIssuers))]] issuers comprise [[Percent(sum(map(TopIssuers, i -> i.groupWeight)))]] of your portfolio by value.

Sectors

[[forAll(filter(SortedSectors, s -> s.groupWeight * 100 >= SectorThreshold), SectorDescription)]]

[[RemainingSectors(filter(SortedSectors, s -> s.groupWeight * 100 < SectorThreshold))]]

The value of your [[PortfolioName]] is [[Dollar(WholeJSON.groupValue)]]. You have investments across [[Alpha(NumberOfIssuers)]] different issuers in the [[WholeJSON.values[0].key]] sector. Your [[Alpha(len(TopIssuers))]] largest allocations by issuer are [[map(TopIssuers, i -> IssuerTotal(i))]] and the [[Alpha(sum(map(TopIssuers, i -> len(i.values))))]] positions across these [[Alpha(len(TopIssuers))]] issuers comprise [[Percent(sum(map(TopIssuers, i -> i.groupWeight)))]] of your portfolio by value.

#define SectorDescription(sector)

[[issuers = len(sector.values);

positions = sum(map(sector.values, i -> len(i.values)));

if( positions == 1 )

{[[SectorOnePosition(sector)]]}

elseif( issuers == 1)

{[[SectorOneIssuer(sector)]]}

else

{[[SectorManyIssuers(sector)]]}]]

#define SectorOnePosition(sector)

The [[chooseAtRandom("only", "lone")]] [[sector.key]] investment is [[chooseAtRandom("a single position of", "a position of", "one positon with")]] [[countable(sector.values[0].values[0].quantity, '', 'unit')]] in [[sector.values[0].key]] at [[Dollar(sector.values[0].values[0].unitValue)]] per unit, for a total of [[Dollar(sector.values[0].values[0].positionValue)]].

#define SectorOneIssuer(sector)

Your positions issued by [[sector.values[0].key]] make up your entire investment in [[sector.key]], totalling [[Dollar(sector.values[0].groupValue)]]. The positions consist of [[map(sector.values[0].values, p -> Position(p))]].

#define SectorManyIssuers(sector)

[[sortedIssuers = sort(sector.values, (a,b) -> b.groupValue - a.groupValue);

if(percentage(sortedIssuers[0].groupValue, sector.groupValue) > SignificantIssuerThreshold)

{[[SectorMostlyOneIssuer(sector, sortedIssuers[0], filter(sortedIssuers, i -> i != sortedIssuers[0]))]]}

else

{[[SectorSplit(sector, sortedIssuers, sortedIssuers[0])]]}]]

#define RemainingSectors(sectors) [[
sectorCount = len(sectors);
if(sectorCount == 1)

{Your portfolio also includes a small investment in [[sectors[0].key]] accounting for [[Percent(sectors[0].groupWeight)]] of the total portfolio.}

elseif(sectorCount > 1)

{

Remainder

The portfolio has also invested in [[map(sectors, s -> s.key)]], but these each make up less than [[SectorThreshold]]% of the total portfolio.}

]]

#define SectorMostlyOneIssuer(sector, mainIssuer, otherIssuers)

The [[sector.key]] investment is almost entirely made up from your [[inflectNoun('position',len(mainIssuer.values))]] in [[mainIssuer.key]]. [[

if(len(mainIssuer.values) == 1)

{You have [[Position(mainIssuer.values[0])]], worth a total of [[Dollar(mainIssuer.groupValue)]]}

else

{They are worth [[Dollar(mainIssuer.groupValue)]] and consist of [[map(mainIssuer.values, p -> Position(p))]]}

]]. [[

if(len(otherIssuers) ==1)

{The remainder is achieved through [[Dollar(otherIssuers[0].groupValue)]] in [[otherIssuers[0].keyâ€‹]]}

elseif(len(otherIssuers) <= Top)

{The remainder is spread across [[map(otherIssuers, i -> i.key)]] and comprises [[sum(map(otherIssuers, i -> len(i.values)))]] positions}

else

{The biggest other [[sector.key]] investments are in [[map(top(otherIssuers, Top), i -> i.key)]]}

]].

#define SectorSplit(sector, sortedIssuers, biggestIssuer)

[[if(len(sortedIssuers) > Top)

{The top [[Alpha(Top)]] issuers within [[sector.key]] are [[map(sortedIssuers, i -> IssuerTotal(i))]]}

else

{There are [[numToWords(len(sortedIssuers),'',10)]] issuers under your [[sector.key]] investments. These are [[map(sortedIssuers, i -> IssuerTotal(i))]]}

]]. The largest issuer, [[sortedIssuers[0].key]] represents [[Percent(sortedIssuers[0].groupValue / sector.groupValue)]] of your [[sector.key]] investment and [[Percent(sortedIssuers[0].groupWeight)]] of your overall investment.

mappings.dataSource: [[sort(reduce(map(SortedSectors, s -> s.values), EmptyList, (a,b) -> concat(a,map(b, x -> x))), (c,d) -> d.groupValue - c.groupValue)]]
